description: Brandt's Dwarf Japanese Maple is truly a unique and amazing species. Reaching a maximum size of only two feet in height and three feet in width, this miniature maple tree features lacey, finely-cut leaves in a deep burgundy color. In the spring, Brandt's Dwarf Japanese Maple bears small, star-shaped reddish-pink flowers, which are followed in autumn by cloud-like clusters of tiny red fruits. Fascinating and resilient, this plant is drought-tolerant and slow-growing, perfect for gardens and containers. Its vibrant foliage and low maintenance make it a great addition to any landscape.
